name: Energy Crisis
description:
Energy Crisis Your contract : kill everybody in the house. Your weapon : a lazer gun with only one shoot.

This game has been made in 48h for the GMTK 2019 game jam.

Controls :

Right click (or long press on touch screen) to move,

Left click(or short press on touch screen) to shoot.

Music :

"Beat 'Em Up Jazz Club" by Spring  https://opengameart.org/users/spring
